localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Detail is a virtual camera that you can use in Zoom, Loom, Twitch, Whereby, or your favorite streaming software. Use your iPhone or iPad as your camera, switch between cameras, pick your favorite filter and record high quality video while streaming live.
blogPost.body: Detail is a virtual camera that you can use in Zoom, Loom, Twitch, Whereby, or your favorite streaming software. Use your iPhone or iPad as your camera, switch between cameras, pick your favorite filter and record high quality video while streaming live.
blogPost.title: Detail - Upgrade your camera & turn your Mac into a production studio
blogPost.author: Paul Veugen

previous.excerpt: OneSchema is a super simple spreadsheet UI for detecting and correcting errors in CSV data. You can use it when you repeatedly need to upload data to a system with a known schema (like setting up new customers in a SaaS product, uploading a catalog monthly)
previous.title: OneSchema - Import customer CSV data 10x faster
